meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used to secure or close something
meanings.sent1: She used the fastenings on her backpack to keep her books safe.
meanings.sent2: The fastenings on the gate were old and rusty, making it difficult to open.
meanings.sent3: The fastenings on the treasure chest were so tricky that even the pirates struggled to open it.
meanings.sent4: His trust issues acted as fastenings, preventing him from forming close relationships.
meanings.sent5: The fastenings on the necklace sparkled in the sunlight, adding a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: The action of securing or closing something with a device or mechanism
meanings.sent1: He completed the fastenings on the tent before the storm hit.
meanings.sent2: The fastenings of the window were loose, causing a draft to enter the room.
meanings.sent3: The fastenings of the puzzle box clicked into place, revealing the hidden compartment.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted as fastenings, bringing the group closer together.
meanings.sent5: The fastenings of the door held firm against the strong wind, keeping the room warm.
